Question: Hanseo University CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Hanseo University

CES 2024

- Hisense will showcase its upcoming 110-inch Mini LED TV with 10,000 nits peak brightness and 40,000 backlight zones, featuring STW2.0 wide-angle film technology to reduce glare and improve viewing angles.

- FiiO is expected to unveil the R9 all-in-one desktop system, an advanced hi-fi system/DAC/headphone amplifier with a large color display, various input options, and support for streaming services.

- Sennheiser plans to reveal new products, potentially including a new pair of headphones, with details to be announced during the CES event.

- Audio Pro will introduce a new flagship wireless speaker model with support for streaming via Spotify Connect and Tidal Connect, along with AirPlay2 and Google Cast compatibility.

- Other brands like JBL are anticipated to launch new products, potentially including streaming turntables, wireless earbuds, and a focus on spatial audio technology.
